title: Leavebuster without being afk ???
body:
So wtf RIOT .
Before the new year i have played 13 custom games to teach my brother how to play the game and i stopped playing for a week . Now on 01.01.2017 when i firstly logged in for this year i recieved a message saying that i have leavebuster for 5 games but i haven't been afk ! 
The last 13 custom games were fully played and even before these games i haven't been afk . 
What is goin on SERIOUSLY ?
Im waking up going for a game and i recieve this punishment without doing anything wrong !

replies.body: It looks like you received a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) after leaving an ai vs coop match.  This game mode is still a match made game with other players participating, and leaving does cause a negative experience.  I think it's awesome that you want to teach your brother, and if you need a game where you can restart whenever the custom mode matches would be your best bet.  Let me know if that clears things up!
